00014 TMOptimizer :: TMOptimizer(DistanceMeasure& _distance, Smoother& _smoother, TMSolver& _solv)
00015     : solver(_solv),
00016         distance(_distance),
00017         smoother(_smoother),
00018         alpha(-1.0),
00019         tau(-1.0)
00020   {};
00021 
00022 TMOptimizer :: TMOptimizer(DistanceMeasure& _distance, Smoother& _smoother, TMSolver& _solv, double _alpha, double _tau)
00023     : solver(_solv),
00024         distance(_distance),
00025         smoother(_smoother),
00026         alpha(_alpha),
00027         tau(_tau)
00028   {};
00029 
00030 void TMOptimizer :: setParameter(double _alpha, double _tau) {
00031   alpha = _alpha;
00032   tau = _tau;
00033 };
00034 
00035 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 Array& TMOptimizer :: getUpdate() {
00037   return solver.getAns();
00038 };
00039 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 void TMOptimizer :: computeDisplacementUpdate(Displacement& u) {
00041   Array& rhs       = solver.getRhs();
00042   
00043   const Array& f = distance.getGradient();
00044   int endloop = rhs.getNumberOfElements();
00045 
00046   for (int k = 0; k < endloop; k++) {
00047     rhs.getData()[k] = u.getData()[k] - tau * f.getData()[k];
00048   }
00049 
00050   solver.solve();
00051   
00052 };
00053

00071   : solver(_solv),
00072     distance(_distance),
00073     smoother(_smoother),
00074     alpha(_alpha)
00075 {};
00076 
00077 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 
00079 void FPOptimizer :: setAlpha(double _alpha) {
00080   alpha = _alpha;
00081 };
00082 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 Array& FPOptimizer :: getUpdate() {
00084   return solver.getAns();
00085 };
00086 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 void FPOptimizer :: computeDisplacementUpdate(Displacement& u) {
00088   Array& rhs       = solver.getRhs();
00089   const Array& f = distance.getGradient();
00090   int endloop = rhs.getNumberOfElements();
00091 
00092   for (int k = 0; k < endloop; k++) {
00093     rhs.getData()[k] = - f.getData()[k];
00094   }
00095 
00096   solver.solve();
00097 
00098 };
00099 
00100 }
